attributes.action: to ask oil companies to introduce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: oil prices and petrol companies to show lower prices of fuel for ppl to buy at the petrol pump without a delay in price of crude oil going down in terms of petrol prices and also introduce  fuel types in petrol stations which are different petrol, diesel and like lpg, cng, hydrogen, biodiesel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
